oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interior view of Candy’s Inc. store, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1939
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An interior view of the Candy’s Inc. store in downtown Nashville, Tennessee. According to the 1939 City Directory, Candy’s Inc. was located at 507 Church Street, with H. W. Candy, President, “Makers and Bakers of Fine Candies, Cakes and Pastries.” Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Candy’s Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.)
Buildings--Tennessee--Nashville; Interior architecture--Tennessee--Nashville
